|brand = Arista |model = C-250 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TOR-C250 |icid = 8252A-C250 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8078A;Qualcomm, IP!8078A, 000, HE85246Z; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = <!-- 2.0 GHz 2.2 GHz (+ 2x NPU @1.7GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30UF4G18AB-XKI; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT40A256M16GE-083E:B; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8081; |eth3chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8081; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.3 |pwr_poe_type = bt |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, OFDMA, MU-MIMO, HE80+80, VHT80+80, Bluetooth 4.1, |addchip = Dual-Band Scanning Radio;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;Q, QCA9882-BR4A, FK82089P, 1820, TAIWAN;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 852F7P;1; ,,, 2.5GbE PHY (56-pin MQFN);Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8081;QUALCOMM, QCA8081, 002, FE849TQD;2; ,,, Power Management IC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;QUALCOMM, PMP8074, 000-01, PU8412L9;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/08/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5154;Q, QCN5154, 007, FE8512SV; |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5154;Q, QCN5154, 007, FE8512SV; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 8 |rad1rxchains = 8 |rad1sstreams = 8 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 4804 |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5124;Q, QCN5124, 007, FE850VFB; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
|rad3mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad3modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad3chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = Dual-Band Scan Radio |rad3ay = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3ax = <!-- 1148, 1150, 4800, 4804, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3ad = <!-- ???, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3ac = <!-- 433, 565, 600, 867, 900, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== As with other similarly specced products, this device only supports 80MHz channel bandwidth when operating with eight spatial streams. It may support 80+80 or 160MHz channels by dropping down to four spatial streams.
"D9TGQ" Micron [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9TGQ FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to the MT40A256M16GE-083E:B
==Links of Interest== [https://www.arista.com/assets/data/pdf/Datasheets/Arista-C-250-Datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
